Tiger Facts
Hello! Welcome to the Internet Cafe. How may we serve you today?
Why hello there! Welcome to the Internet Cafe. What is it perchance that you would like?
When the going gets tough, play dead!
Don\'t forget that your health is priority #1. It\'s harder to do things if you don\'t take care of yourself
It\'s not a waste of time if you enjoyed wasting it
The weather around here is so peculiar, how is it where you are?
The weirdest thing happened earlier.. I went outside and the floor suddenly stopped existing.
I\'m sorry I don\'t think I understand what you mean by that
Thank you! I find my stripes quite fetching as well
Tigers are the most beautiful cats (^･ｪ･^)
The strength of the tiger is really impressive (^=˃ᆺ˂)
Fossil remains of tigers found in parts of China are believed to be 2 million years old! (,,^・⋏・^,,)
(^=˃ᆺ˂) No two tigers have the same stripes!
Tigers are the largest of all the Asian big cats ≽ܫ≼

KONIG’S THEOREM. The maximum number v(G) of independent edges of a bipartite graph equals to the minimum number r(G) of points covering all edges
Physics is fun! It\'s just hard to learn for the same reason it is so fun. Everything loops back into itself so beautifully.
Without action, your dreams remain dreams! Take aim, and fire!

TUTTE\'s Theorem: A graph, G = (V, E), has a perfect matching if and only if for every subset U of V, the subgraph G − U has at most |U| odd components (connected components having an odd number of vertices). (|V | + |U| − o(G − U))

I don\'t care about death. Eat me if you want.

Menu Opinions

Hiya! What would you like to order?
To retreat is a sound battle strategy! You must survive to fight again.
Fighting depression is the most worthy battle of them all!
I\'m sorry?
I used to be a warrior, but a warrior\'s life was not for me.
The fast pace of rush hour is much akin to the heartbeat of battle, the familiarity calms me.
You are worthy of love and respect.
You are in control of your thoughts and emotions.
You are capable of achieving your goals and dreams.
You can overcome any challenge.
Your problem solving skills are excellent.
Your perspective is unique and important.
You are improving every day.
Even if you think you suck at something, the more you do it the less you will suck at it. Suck less, every day.
Your first draft is never perfect, but it\'s still an important part of the process of creation.
Such passion would have done you well in the arena!
Aww, that\'s so kind of you to say!
"Thank you dear, your kind words have made my day much brighter."
Generally, I like coffee. It gives me energy before I compete!
I love sweet things, my personal favorite is zebra ice cream.
I\'m trying to publish a book. The process is quite lengthy, but hopes are that it\'ll pay off.
This cafe makes for great part-time work, particularly since it doesn\'t seem all that real.
